Template.name: sap.ui.unified.ContentSwitcher
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.ui.unified.ContentSwitcher({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID animation: "None", // string activeContent: 1, // int tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData content1: [], // sap.ui.core.Control content2: [] // sap.ui.core.Control })
Template.xmlTemplate: <ContentSwitcher xmlns="sap.ui.unified" id="${id}" animation="None" activeContent="1"> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <content1></content1> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> <content2></content2> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> </ContentSwitcher>

Template.name: sap.ui.unified.Shell
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.ui.unified.Shell({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID icon: undefined, // sap.ui.core.URI showPane: undefined, // boolean showCurtain: undefined, // boolean showCurtainPane: undefined, // boolean headerHiding: undefined, // boolean tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData content: [], // sap.ui.core.Control paneContent: [], // sap.ui.core.Control curtainContent: [], // sap.ui.core.Control curtainPaneContent: [], // sap.ui.core.Control headItems: [], // sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadItem headEndItems: [], // sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadItem search: undefined // sap.ui.core.Control })
Template.xmlTemplate: <Shell xmlns="sap.ui.unified" id="${id}" icon="" showPane="" showCurtain="" showCurtainPane="" headerHiding=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <content></content> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> <paneContent></paneContent> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> <curtainContent></curtainContent> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> <curtainPaneContent></curtainPaneContent> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> <headItems></headItems> <!-- sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadItem --> <headEndItems></headEndItems> <!-- sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadItem --> <search></search> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> </Shell>

Template.name: sap.ui.unified.ShellHeadItem
Template.xmlTemplate: <ShellHeadItem xmlns="sap.ui.unified" id="${id}" startsSection="false" selected="false" showMarker="false" icon="" press=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> </ShellHeadItem>

Template.name: sap.ui.unified.ShellOverlay
Template.xmlTemplate: <ShellOverlay xmlns="sap.ui.unified" id="${id}" shell="" closed=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <content></content> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> <search></search> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> </ShellOverlay>

Template.name: sap.ui.unified.SplitContainer
Template.jsTemplate: new sap.ui.unified.SplitContainer({ id: "${id}", // sap.ui.core.ID showSecondaryContent: undefined, // boolean secondaryContentWidth: "250px", // sap.ui.core.CSSSize tooltip: undefined, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase customData: [], // sap.ui.core.CustomData content: [], // sap.ui.core.Control secondaryContent: [] // sap.ui.core.Control })
Template.xmlTemplate: <SplitContainer xmlns="sap.ui.unified" id="${id}" showSecondaryContent="" secondaryContentWidth="250px"> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <content></content> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> <secondaryContent></secondaryContent> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control --> </SplitContainer>
